# Testando antes

```{python}
#| fig-align: center
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 200)
y = np.cos(x)
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("cos(x)")
plt.show()
```
